评论详情: I was looking for a more lighter material
These are great-super soft and comfortable but also stylish! I plan to wear these out as well as at home.

These pants are cloud soft.  I am 5'3" 125# and small fit perfectly.  I usually wear size 4-6, mostly 6.  These are lightweight (think summer), reasonably flattering (lots of drape -- see photo), and great for pajamas, light workouts, or lounging around the house or neighborhood.  Please note there are 2 styles represented here -- one with a waistband and drawstring, the other with no drawstring.  I bought the no-drawstring style.  Sadly, I only found three colors for this style -- blue, black, and gray.  I may still buy one more pair.  Edited to add:  Went back to buy more and they were out of stock.  Checked back on a regular basis -- no luck until today.  I immediately ordered 3 pairs.  These are so comfy, wash well in my front loading washer, and I hang dry them.  My first pair was black, and are not see through at all; I will update you on whether blue or gray are see-through (always a risk) but if so, I plan to make them PJs.  Edit:  I do not find blue or gray to be see-through but please note the material is thin.

评论概述: Poorly made, too long - a disappointing purchase
评论详情: Unless you're 5'6"+ and 120lbs, these probably won't look great on you. At 5'2" and 160lbs, the size large was WAY too long, with the waist right under my chest. They looked absolutely goofy on me; not at all flattering. While I know I'm overweight, I'm not terribly so, keeping myself pretty active, but because of my little belly these made me look pregnant. Not cute and not made for anyone who doesn't have a perfect body. No thanks.

Bought the animal print and they are super cute! Fit and feel perfect! I wear these to work. Perfect way to look professional while also being comfy. Definitely buying more. I've washed and worn them a lot and they come out of the dryer like new everytime. No pilling, unraveling or fading. Love these pants!

I LIVE in comfy pants. So I was excited about these BUT I was so confused about what the actual material would be between each of the colors?! So I purchased 3 pairs of these pants to compare, and I’m hoping this helps someone else in deciding!!  I am 5’3” and 135lbs with thicker legs and booty. Pants I bought were: C Leopard Brown (small) C Leopard 1 (small) C Leopard (white, medium)  C Leopard 1: a brownish-gray color, cargo pockets on the outsides of both thighs AND pockets at both hips, elastic bunched at ankle ends and *100% VISCOUS* material! The advertised info is wrong for these as they are NOT the polyester/spandex blend. These pants are more starchy-feeling instead of being silky soft (though it might be softer after a wash) but I won’t keep these as comfy lounge pants. They would be super cute for wearing out in the spring/summertime. In general, viscous fabrics are breathable, but they are susceptible to shrinking with each wash and deteriorating more quickly. FIT: (SMALL) felt a little tight around my hips and butt at first but was comfy once I pulled the waist up. I’d keep these if I was looking for business casual style pants, but I’m on the search for cute and comfortable.  C Leopard: White, tag says 95% polyester 5% spandex. These were the softest of the 3 pairs but were definitely not that “buttery soft” smooth material like LuLaRoe and other brand leggings are. Got a Medium in these and the length is about 2 inches longer than the Small, and 1.5 inches wider in the waist. These have a sewn on flat cuff around the ankle. Pockets at hips. White pants are NOT see though! FIT: (Medium) baggy, bunched at my ankles, all around loose around my entire legs. Technically could stay on me just fine, but too big for my liking.  C Leopard Brown: 95% polyester 5% spandex, similar to the white pair but not quite as soft. I was surprised the material felt different from the white pair, but I’m wondering if that’s because of the coloring process to make these brown. These also have a sewn flat ankle cuff and pockets at hips. FIT: (SMALL) they felt great! Since I’m only 5’3” they bunched at my ankles but not as bad at the medium. Were the perfect tightness around my legs, plenty of stretch throughout.  I was searching for a review with these details when I was deciding on which ones to buy, so I really hope this helps you in your online shopping! :)

评论概述: Comfy and Fit, but VERY SHINY
评论详情: So, I ordered this based on all the photos, however it is not at all what I expected. In all the photos these pants look matte, almost cotton/linen like texture and appearance. They are actually so shiny like silk. They are incredibly comfortable and fit great, however they are not at all what I'd wanted in material/appearance. So just be warned if you want a casual matte jogger these aren't it. They're more like PJ pants texture and shinieness

评论概述: These pants are satin, not cotton
评论详情: I like the color a lot. The material is not as expected, but the satin does dress them up
Why do they make the elastic waist so freaking tight??  They would be cute but I prefer to not feel like I’m being cut in half. a large should not fit like a small.

This is a really cute print and the fit was excellent. I have a 32 inch inseam and these came to my ankles so that was a plus. Overall, very comfortable. The only problem is the fabric is more appropriate for pajamas than for streetwear.  I really wanted to be able to wear these out, but no, they’re just too pajama-ish.
Comfortable and very soft
These pants were one of my favorites and they’ve ripped after two times wearing them
Do not look like the photo. Very shiny and a very loud color. Also the fit is odd.

评论概述: Fabric unknown, color is off, odd smell & too big.
评论详情: I’m not going to say not to get these joggers because they are comfy but I ordered a medium and they are quiet large. I ordered the black leopard print and they are also much darker than the images. I’m only 5’2” so I always expect pants to be longer on me. If it goes to the ankle on the 5’7”model, it’s probably going to touch the ground or scrunch up at the bottom which is what these did. Fine but the rest of the fit is also larger than a normal medium. The material is ok, it’s a bit thick for summer but it does have this weird glue like smell, maybe from the factory. No tags on it so can’t really tell what fabric it is as I find what they say on the description doesn’t always match the actual product. Overall these are ok for house lounging, wouldn’t really wear them out. I was expecting, from the pictures to have a cute pair of pants to wear out and about but sadly they fit and look more like pajama bottoms. I think I’m going to give up buying random pants on Amazon as I’ve never truly been satisfied with what I receive. Much better to go to a store, try it on, and spend a little more but buy fewer items that end up in the junk or “lounge” pile.
Very comfortable and great quality

评论概述: Very cheap material. Oversized. Dry clean
评论详情: Very cheap material. Oversized. Dry clean

评论概述: Get your normal size, don’t size up
评论详情: These are so soft and so cute! I was worried they would be see-through and they are not at all. They are a little bigger than I thought they would be, I’m normally a large/XL in leggings and wear a 16 to 18 in pants. I’m 5’3’’ and 250 pounds and carry extra weight in my belly. I ordered a 2X since that’s what I normally do when I order clothes from SHEIN and stuff like that. I was pleasantly surprised – they were bigger on the ankles and the waistband was a little big thankfully there’s a drawstring. They can look like pajama pants if you don’t style them well. All of the stitching and cuffs are really thick and felt high-quality.

I was so excited to get these pants, but was pretty disappointed to discover that they have a shiny, satin sheen to them.  I was expecting more of a linen type material, making them a bit more boho.  The fit and color are absolutely great, but the material just wasn’t what I was hoping for here - makes them way more dressy than I was anticipating.

I ordered Khaki size Large, package says 12-14. It’s a nice color, but it isn’t khaki; it has a pink cast to it. The fabric is 100% polyester, and feels sort of like the material athletic jackets and joggers are made of. It feels very soft on the outside but rougher on the inside, against my skin. The elastic at the ankle doesn’t cinch much. The ankle is almost as wide as the rest of the pant leg, which is not what I want in a jogger. I bought these on sale for about $24, but that’s about the same price I paid for a great pair of joggers elsewhere. These are cheap, overpriced pants.
These are lightweight, soft and so comfortable. You'll enjoy how stretchy they are. But they did shrink a bit even when washed in warm water

I like the fact that these perfectly pink joggers fits me correctly. At 5"6 and XXL the length is not to baggy nor too short. The fits gives plenty of room for moment. The fabric is not see threw, however I found them to be a little heavy for 90 degree weather and maybe to light for the cold winter but they do have enough room for tights or thermals underneath. I don't like that the fabric is scratchy on the inside and the pockets are not deep enough to hold my cell phone infact I don't trust anything in my pockets they are that swallow. I may have to iron them but I hope not. I did order 12 pairs and return most of them because the colors was off: The red was more like burgundy The black was more like a deep grayish brown The khaki was not dark enough more like cream The greens look like army green and another lighter than evergreen The white was on point as well as the pink and royal blue. One brown was like a deep orange actually very pretty but not what I was expecting I feel that these joggers are definitely overpriced even at the sale price,poop o poobut they good on me!

评论概述: could be mistaken for pj pants
评论详情: I love the print and the fit, but I do not like the material too much. These are adorable pants with an amazing funky print. Due to the stretchy cotton material, if they are not dressed up with the right top, they can be mistaken as pj pants. Don't wear a tshirt with these pants or you will look dress down.
The material is good, but the crotch is very bag and drops down low.

I was looking for something to wear around the house and these fit the bill. They’re cute and comfortable, and at 5’2” the length is fine. They are somewhat baggy around the front, stomach area, so if I were going to wear these out I might return them, but fine for my purpose.

评论概述: Had To Send Back, But Nice Pants
评论详情: The waist was stitched such as the material through the middle was extremely baggy. Probably just a one off. However, the material was thicker that expected. Not ideal for summer in Arizona. BUT, the material was nice and the cut of the legs nice and roomy.  I would buy these pants again hoping the material through the stomach was fit much better. Also, beware that the color “Brown” is closer to Orange. These are nice pants for the cost and the material is not flimsy.

Don’t look like the picture but they were fine so ended up keeping them. Just know they’re  a much lighter color & quite long… like I can fold the bottom cuff twice and they are still full length covering my ankles
I got these pants and I like them. I haven’t worn them yet. When I tried them on the waistband isn’t completely secured all the way around but it isn’t something that makes them unable to be worn

Love the material. It’s a bit heavier for FL but I’ll keep. Will be able to wear casually or dress up. The only thing is that they are a bit high waisted for me but I’ll just roll down the elastic. I’m 5’2” and they are the perfect length.  The pockets are great!  Great price point!

评论概述: Great pants but color is off
评论详情: I love these pants but the color is not what I expected. I ordered khaki thinking it would be light tan/brown as it looks in the picture. Nope. It's a pale pink. It's fine. I still like them, but not the color I wanted.

评论概述: Very comfortable and easy to style
评论详情: This is my 3rd pair of these pants. I have in various colors. Very comfortable and can be styled with so many options. After a few washes the fabric gets slightly pilled looking so beware of that.
Comfortable stylish joggers. True to size. Looks good dressed up or down. I would highly recommend.
Color was great, material is soft and comfortable.

I have had two pairs of these and I size up to allow for a little extra room. I will say they both vary in the sizing and how big they are on me. The second pair is tight and not as roomy, I am glad that I sized up.
These pants are super cute, comfortable and stylish but are really thick.
I thought these would be different - these are more like a pajama. I almost returned them, but they are super soft and comfy with nice pockets. I like them overall.
These joggers are super comfortable. The fabric is great and the material is not see-through, which makes them perfect for work.

I bought these pants because I was looking for something to do physical therapy and for my legs and jeans are too tight for that. I thought these were lightweight which they are not they are soft and comfortable. I normally wear a size medium but so I could have a little extra room for therapy I bought a large. Large fits tight and waste a little snug. Not much more room in the legs than a pair of jeans. Not sure I will buy another pair because I think an extra large will be too big. Not sure if they will shrink when washed and dried.
The material is thinner than I expected, but still looks nice. These are loose fitting pants, but not baggy. I really like the elastic waistband and the ankle cuffs.

评论用户: Got this for a friends daughter and she loved it, exactly what she wanted!
评论详情: These pants are more like a pajama pant material than a casual lightweight or as they call it breezy type pant. They are a thicker material, still very cute and comfy.

Nice pants - honestly thicker than I was expecting but it makes them way more comfy. It gives a "sweatpants leggings" kinda feel in that way. The downer was the color. These bad boys are PINK. Not beige-y, neutral color. No no. PINK. I feel like an old school 90's wrestler, which I mean depending where you work it isn't totally office appropriate. I'll test my luck next week - will report back.
Very comfort ,light weight, & cute pattern
Fit was okay - a little on the small side.  Material is thick.  I was expecting them to be thinner and softer so I returned

These are more like sweats than what they look like. I bought them thinking they’d look cute with a pair of heels. Definitely not work appropriate (for me). Comfy to lounge in though. Keeping to wear to bed.
Loved this! Fit well washed well and want to buy some more of this brand!

I really like the look and feel of these pants. They are lightweight and breathable, but not sheer at all. Unfortunately, they have a ton of tiny snags on them after washing twice on a gentle cycle, and hanging them to dry.
Item way too long

Ordered C Leopard in a medium. Fits perfect, pants are soft and comfortable with a little stretch.  Plenty of room for my hips and the waist elastic isn’t too tight in my waist. I’m 5’5, 150 pounds. Ankle cuffs are not elastic, but has the same stretch as the rest of the pants. Thinking about ordering other pairs now!

评论概述: Material too heavy for summer wear
评论详情: Material of pants pretty heavy so way too hot for Summer. Liked the fact that they had pockets.
Very thick material. I got these to wear on a flight from Chicago to Florida in the summer… they’re like sweatpants. Cute and comfy… but not summer pants

Many have said these run big, but I feel they they are true to size in the waist. The large area is the crotch/butt. If you look closely at the models, you can clearly see that it is baggy in that area. I’m dating myself, but kinda reminds me of MC Hammer pants 🤣 As for comfort? Well, I expected them to be extremely soft out of the bag. They are not. Just ok, which is why only 4 stars.
The material was weird on these. I didn’t love them but I also didn’t hate them. But I didn’t like them enough to keep them
Inexpensive.  Didn't like non recyclable material
exact fit, slightly thick, good for colder weather

I was skeptical about buying this type  of pants because I was afraid they would make me looker bigger than I am (5’3 170lbs) because the legs of this item are blousy but I’m fixing to order me another pair now. They are cute, comfortable, and I absolutely love them. I feel like they actually slim me down a bit.

These are soft and comfy. Can wear them comfortably around the house or out for errands. Maybe even to work if you have a casual work place. However they run really large. Based on the size recommendation I got a large but they fit more like an extra large if not 2X and they do not shrink. I'm 5'9" 175 athletic build and bottom heavy. I plan on purchasing again but in a medium and exchange for a small if that's too big. Hopefully the medium will do.

I’m 5’4” 120lbs with more junk in the trunk and longer torso. I ordered a small and medium. Small still fits a little large, but in a comfy way. The crotch to waistband ratio is wild, but thankfully I have a long torso so it came alllllllllllll the way up to my bellybutton and the crotch sagged a bit, again, in a relaxed comfy way. I could have gone with an extra small and been fine. The material is thick, but very clearly non-breathable. Certainly NOT for hot weather, but rather for a comfy day at home or running errands. I already started a return for the medium. On the fence about the smalls. They are fine, but I’m trying to start 2023 by only buying things that are unique and/or that I absolutely love. And I don’t think I love these. . . Ok it’s settled, I’m also returning the small. . .

As a 24 year old women who’s only 5’1 I never expect any pants to fit at the ankles and to be too long. These are beyond comfortable and well worth the price. It has a tone of stretch! Thought about sending it back for a smaller size but to be honest, is it worth it after all the bloating? Probably not. I would think a small would do just fine, but I guess it depends on what look/comfort style you are going for! Like I said… it has a TON of wiggle room. I do have wide hips and larger behind so normally I do wear medium bottoms. Over all, amazing product!

评论概述: These joggers make me feel like having fun!
评论详情: I love the print on these joggers! They are light weight & so very comfortable!  I hang them to dry & no wrinkles!  Paired with white sneakers & a black top, both found here at Amazon; I’m ready for shopping or meeting friends for dinner!  Treat yourself; you’re worth it!
Soft and comfy but WAY too long. Like comically long. I'm 5'2.

I knew buying them based on other reviews that they were not going to be "professional" material. But I really enjoy that you can still dress them up for a business casual or wear out and about.  I have a feeling they are going to pill really easily as I am thicker in the thighs but that's normal for most pants for me.

It could’ve been complete negligence on my part and not researching enough but these are much thicker than I thought. I like them a lot, but I was shopping for a very thin jogger I could wear in warmer weather and this is not it. These are more “wear around the house, lounge pants”. I probably wouldn’t wear them out of the house bc they look a bit like pajamas but super comfy and I like them a lot!
Cute and comfy pants. Love that you can dress them up or down. Material is super soft. Fits comfortably.
Love the print. Super comfy. I thought they would be softer but that's alright. Paired well with a black shirt. My new go to outfit
SO COMFY!! Best teacher pants! Cut, but feels like you are in your cozy’s at home! Lol. TTS 10/10 recommend!

评论概述: Order a size down, high waisted
评论详情: I originally bought this in a large but they were very large, sized down to a medium which fit well.  Love these pants for traveling on an airplane but they do sit very high on the waist.  I fold them over but the elastic is not sewn where they are able to do so fully.  Would still buy another pair as they feel like I am wearing pj pants all day.

I will do just one review because I bought two pair! One for myself and one for my Sister. We will attend a Family aRenunion in June and will wear them the. We usually by something alike to look special and as a conversation starter! The fit is good and material is soft.
Very fast shipping, comfy and cute !

评论概述: Pattern ordered is not what was received
评论详情: I liked the soft material and the thickness. But I ordered the white leopard print and the pattern looked more like small black brushstrokes. Would have kept if the material was as advertised.

I got these for back to school because this style is usually comfortable and professional, but I have worn them once and have not even washed them yet and they have already worn and torn this much. One use. Just sitting and standing and moving around at school did this much damage in one day. It’s too late for me to return, but be warned!

Comfortable and soft. I ordered my first pair according to their size chart(XL) and they were way too big. I then ordered the Large and they were still very baggy. I got the Medium and they are perfect. I liked them so much I ordered a second pair and now I’m about to order a third pair.  The material is good quality, stitching has also been good and the elastic and drawstring is holding its shape also.  If you’re like me and can dress casual for work and love athleisure wear, you need these pants!

I've been on the hunt for the illusive "perfect joggers" . I'm 5'9 so it's been a challenge to find joggers that don't look like capris. I got the XL and they were definitely long enough. But way too big everywhere else. The legs were loose and the cuffs were pretty loose as well. The waistband is fine-not too tight or too loose, but the front looks like there is room for another person! It just looks extremely awkward. The crotch is pretty low too which some people might like but I don't like that. It was hard for me to get a good picture of the actual color but the green is brighter than what my pictures show-the Amazon photo for the product is more accurate to the true color. Overall these joggers just didn't work for me, I am returning.

评论概述: Very Comfy Pants- But Not Silky Like Picture Shows
评论详情: These pants look just like in the picture, except for the fact that they are not shiny or silky- they are made of cotton. However, this was not a problem for me. You can definitely dress these pants up or down- they look extra cute with a denim jacket in fact :)  The material is comfortable, but I could see some people describing the fabric is being scratchy, but this does not bother me. They fit well and are very flattering! I may grab a few other colors, since these work as pants to wear around the house for comfort or for going out :)
I love the look and feel of these! The only downside for me was the bottom of the leg where it scrunches was too wide - but I just rolled them over and they look okay.
Very soft and comfortable. I bought two more colors.

I just received them and tried them on. They are true to size, comfy material, don’t snug around the stomach or dig in.  I am 5 ft 7 in 230 lbs and I usually order XL, but I find that with most clothing on Amazon is best to go size up. I could’ve ordered XL and they would be snug. I wanted to be comfy.I was looking for something comfy and casual for summertime and the office: I ordered navy blue, and they are really dark. Overall, no complains. Will probably ordered more soon.  I suggest to wash it in cold with dark colors, and air dry it.
Comfortable but a little loose in the legs. However, I often wear to work and receive a lot of compliments on them!
Fine pants, in one description, said they are linen..that's why I bought them..they are not linen,.confusing
These pants are really cute but they don’t breathe! If you are hot natured, you will be sweating within minutes! They don’t stretch much and are a little snug.
Too small, length and leg room. Nice fabric
Soft, made well and comfortable. Washes easily.

I wear a size 16 woman in bottoms. I ordered a 3xl so these would fit flowy and loose. I did not want them tight on my mid section.  I love them. The material is heavier than expected and probably couldn't wear on a hot day.

Update 3/15/24: *Be aware that the pants with pattern are a different material than the solid color pants.  Solid color pants are like a crepe, almost silky, very light weight fabric. Patterned pants are a light weight sweat suit material.  I love the fit of both.I'm 5'5" 129 lbs, ordered medium.  Recommend.

评论概述: Great Pant but sizes are consistently INCONSISTENT
评论详情: Originally gave these a 5 star after ordering a solid green that turned out to be silky material.  Not for casual but a leapord print was a stretchy material very comfy. So, ordered 3 more printed version all in different colors, all size medium. They all came marked as medium but they all fit different. They arrive from different locations.  Not sure if that has anything to do with why the size charts are inconsistent. But here is what I found with leapord print, again all in size medium.  (I’m 54yrs old.  I’m 5’3 and weight 134lbs. Most weight Is in my tummy.) so,  The blue fits like a true medium. The the dark green fits like a petite medium, brown fits like a large and the whit feels more like a xl.  Legs especially are longer and much wider.
Love the material, it’s not too thin and not sweat shirt thick.  Fit is perfect! Very comfortable!

I’ve ordered multiple pairs of these pants.  The green pair came with fabric that was very rough…not soft at all.  It is very uncomfortable especially around the waist area because of the fabric used. Very unhappy with these pants.
Comfy, cute, teue to size. Only problem is that the elastic in the waist band flips around while washing it. Kind of annoying
Great buy!!!  Great fabric, quality weight.  Great fit.  Do yourself favor and buy multiple.

评论概述: Great fit, super comfortable, but definitely not what I was expecting
评论详情: I love these pants, they fit great and are really comfortable, however I considered returning them because they aren't what they were described to be. I was expecting an entirely different material that is better for wearing out to run errands/casual lunches/grocery shopping etc however I wouldn't ever wear these out of the house because they look more like pajamas.

I wish I could like these. The images make these look like comfy cotton lounging pants. They are made of a sheer polyester type material. Far from looking casual the fabric makes them look like dress pants gone bad. I am 5’3” and weigh 150 lbs. I have an hour glass figure but bigger thighs. I usually wear a size 10 pant so I bought a large. I wanted a loose look. They fit at the thigh and were baggy everywhere else. Big nope for me. Had to go back. Also the darker gray was pretty light still. Disappointing and cheap all around.

Was expecting the material to feel different, like much lighter but they’re just a heavy cotton like  old school sweat pants 🫠 they’re made with good quality but I wanted to wear them for work and it’s going to be too hot soon for the material
A little long in the crotch but nice material

These are very comfy and warm but they don't look like the picture as far as the cut. The fabric is the same but they don't taper down at the ankles as much so they kind of look like pajama pants. I kept them bc they are cozy but they are just for around the house.

I wanted to love these pants, but they don’t look much like the original picture. They are huge! I feel like a clown, they remind me of Hammer pants. Lol. My husband laughed when he saw me on them. I bought a medium, my typical size.  I’m 5’9. They are just going to be pajamas for me.
Love these.  Fit is perfect. Great for running errands or lounging around the house.
So soft and comfortable! So nice that I got 4 more pairs in different colors! Great for summer! The red and blue are so red beautiful , I can’t wait to get the other ones!
These are very comfortable and cute. They are not an item you can dress up though. They are more for casual wear. I would still purchase them again.
These are SUPER stretchy and comfortable but cute enough to wear to work!

I am 5 ‘4 and have short thick legs. The pants are to long and not tight on the ankles like a jogger should be. I do like the color and the material. They would be great for fall with a shirt tucked in if they fit on the legs.

评论概述: These are awesome pants. But much thicker than I expected. I want them for summer.
评论详情: These are awesome pants. But much thicker than I expected. I want them for summer.

These are very much sweat pants - not what I was expecting. I was thinking they would be like cute jogger pants (that I could dress up and wear out of the house), but they look and feel like cute comfy sweat pants. They are nice sweats. Just not something I could wear out of the house.
